headline: Huntington Bancshares closes on merger with Cadence Bank
summary: TUPELO – After 150 years as a Mississippi-based bank, Cadence Bank has a new name and a new corporate parent. On Monday, Columbus, Ohio-based Huntington Bancshares Inc. closed on its $7.4 billion merger with Cadence Bank. Shareholders of both banks approved the merger last month. Huntington said the strategic partnership "accelerates Huntington's growth initiatives across Texas and the South ...

headline: Here Are Tuesday’s Top Wall Street Analyst Research Calls: Adobe, Disney, Exxon Mobil, Lockheed Martin, Mastercard, Palantir Technologies, SoFi Technologies, and More
summary: Pre-Market Stock Futures: Futures are trading higher after a strong bounce-back Monday, with all major indices ending the day higher, as we started February on a winning note.
